prompt_base: cinematic portrait of a beautiful woman, long straight black hair, intense determined expression, holding a tactical rifle, 8k realistic photo, dynamic lighting
feature_prompt: highly detailed skin texture, subtle facial scars, individual hair strands, realistic fabric weave texture on coat, sharp focus on rifle, leather boots
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, plastic, smooth skin, childish face, flat lighting, low quality, blurry, (deformed rifle:1.3), (too young:1.2), pure white hair
